Package me.agno.gridjavacore

Interface IGridColumnCollection<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the grid data
All Known Implementing Classes:
GridColumnCollection
public interface IGridColumnCollection<T>
Represents a collection of grid columns for a specific grid.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IGridColumn<T>
    add()
    Adds a new column to the grid column collection.
    IGridColumn<T>
    add(boolean hidden)
    Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified hidden state.
    IGridColumn<T>
    add(boolean hidden, String columnName)
    Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified hidden state and column name.
    IGridColumn<T>
    add(String columnName)
    Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified column name.
    <TData> IGridColumn<T>
    add(String expression, Class<TData> targetType)
    Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified expression and target type.
    <TData> IGridColumn<T>
    add(String expression, Class<TData> targetType, boolean hidden)
    Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified expression, target type, and hidden state.
    <TData> IGridColumn<T>
    add(String expression, Class<TData> targetType, String columnName)
    Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified expression, target type, and column name.

    add(IGridColumn<T> column)
    Adds a column to the grid column collection.
    IGridColumn<T>
    get(String name)
    Retrieves a grid column with the specified name.
    IGrid<T>
    getGrid()
    Retrieves the grid associated with this IGridColumnCollection.

  • Method Details

    • getGrid

      IGrid<T> getGrid()
      Retrieves the grid associated with this IGridColumnCollection.
      Returns:
      the grid object

    • add

      IGridColumn<T> add(IGridColumn<T> column)
      Adds a column to the grid column collection.
      Parameters:
      column - the column to be added
      Returns:
      the added grid column
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if column is null
      IllegalArgumentException - if a column with the same name already exists in the grid

    • add

      IGridColumn<T> add()
      Adds a new column to the grid column collection.
      Returns:
      the added grid column

    • add

      IGridColumn<T> add(boolean hidden)
      Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified hidden state.
      Parameters:
      hidden - true if the column should be hidden, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the added grid column

    • add

      IGridColumn<T> add(String columnName)
      Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified column name.
      Parameters:
      columnName - the name of the column to be added
      Returns:
      the added grid column

    • add

      IGridColumn<T> add(boolean hidden, String columnName)
      Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified hidden state and column name.
      Parameters:
      hidden - true if the column should be hidden, false otherwise
      columnName - the name of the column to be added
      Returns:
      the added grid column

    • add

      <TData> IGridColumn<T> add(String expression, Class<TData> targetType)
      Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified expression and target type.
      Type Parameters:
      TData - the type of the column's data
      Parameters:
      expression - the expression used to generate the column for the grid
      targetType - the class representing the target type of the column's data
      Returns:
      the added grid column

    • add

      <TData> IGridColumn<T> add(String expression, Class<TData> targetType, String columnName)
      Adds a column to the grid column collection with the specified expression, target type, and column name.
      Type Parameters:
      TData - the type of the column's data
      Parameters:
      expression - the expression used to generate the column for the grid
      targetType - the class representing the target type of the column's data
      columnName - the name of the column to be added
      Returns:
      the added grid column

      Parameters:
